VUPShionMod:DimensionSplitterAria.NAME: Dimension Splitter: Aria
VUPShionMod:DimensionSplitterAria.FLAVOR: 'Your existence is futile.' says the otherworldly light portends impending destruction.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, deal #b%d ( #b2 + #yUpgrade x3) damage to a random enemy. If #yFatal, repeats and gain [E] . NL It is upgraded whenever you enter the next Act. NL Current Upgrade: #b%d.
Space-based Weapon Preloading in Act 1... NL

VUPShionMod:KuroisuDetermination.NAME: Cloyce's Determination
VUPShionMod:KuroisuDetermination.FLAVOR: Future is a scattering illusion of time that is not ours to foretell. Push through with determination, and this is all we can do.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yRight #yClick: Take an extra turn after this turn, end your turn. (works #b%d times)
This relic has been exhausted.

VUPShionMod:Croissant.NAME: Croissant
VUPShionMod:Croissant.FLAVOR: You just won't bother to notice the void of something on your friend's head, will you?
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, heal #b30 HP.

VUPShionMod:OpticalCamouflage.NAME: Optical Camouflage
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 #yIntangible.

VUPShionMod:Sniperscope.NAME: Sniperscope
VUPShionMod:Sniperscope.FLAVOR: Heard the ticking of your remaining time? Fear not, it will be quick, it will not hurt.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b1 #yVulnerable to the enemy with the least HP. NL Enemies with #yVulnerable take #b75% more damage rather than #b50%.

VUPShionMod:AnastasiaNecklace.NAME: Anastasia Droplet
VUPShionMod:AnastasiaNecklace.FLAVOR: Within which all the power beyond your wield is concentrated.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #yBarricade.
Gain #b200 Max HP. NL Gain #b200 #yBlock at the start of your turn. NL Start each combat with #yBarricade. NL Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
NL ALL #yFunnels are upgraded by #b9. NL #yFunnels now hit ALL enemies. NL Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any #yPursued it has to a random enemy.
Anastasia Droplet(Awakened)

VUPShionMod:Nebula.NAME: Nebula
VUPShionMod:Nebula.FLAVOR: Universal type of support equipment by Anastasia, includes elementary thrusters and energy shields.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b3 #yBlock. Lose #b1 #yStiffness each turn.

VUPShionMod:Protostar.NAME: Protostar
VUPShionMod:Protostar.FLAVOR: Improved model of Nebula with greater thruster power and extra magia barrier generators.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b2 #yBuffer. Lose #b2 #yStiffness each turn.

VUPShionMod:TrackingBeacon.NAME: Tracking Beacon
DESCRIPTIONS: Coordinates have been sent out to your comrades.

VUPShionMod:BlueGiant.NAME: Blue Giant
VUPShionMod:BlueGiant.FLAVOR: Potent ranged firepower in exchange of mobility.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, lose [E] and add 1 #yFunnel #yMatrix into your hand.

VUPShionMod:DarkStar.NAME: Dark Star
VUPShionMod:DarkStar.FLAVOR: Additionally modulized Magia trigger devices, installed with your friend's assistance.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add 1 #yTonitrus #yRapidus into your hand. Combat reward screens now contain cards from universial #yCodex.

VUPShionMod:StarQuakes.NAME: Starquake
VUPShionMod:StarQuakes.FLAVOR: Universal type of support equipment by Anastasia, tachi blade driven by magia.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack, gain #b3 #yCor #yGladii. At the end of your turn, lose #b33% of #yCor #yGladii.

VUPShionMod:BlueSupergiant.NAME: Blue Supergiant
VUPShionMod:BlueSupergiant.FLAVOR: Improved model of the Blue Giant that manifests an enhanced level of output.
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplace Blue Giant. NL At the start of your turn, add a #yFunnel #yMatrix into your hand.

VUPShionMod:PureHeart.NAME: Prototype: Pure Heart
VUPShionMod:PureHeart.FLAVOR: Specialized type of support equipment by Anastasia, powerful blade cumbered by excessive magia that surges within.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, gain #b5 #yCod #yGladii. At the end of your turn, lose #b50% of #yCor #yGladii.

VUPShionMod:WhitePurity.NAME: Prototype: White Purity
VUPShionMod:WhitePurity.FLAVOR: Improved model of Prototype: Pure Heart that is installed with a modified energy inhibitor.
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplace Prototype: Pure Heart. NL Whenever you play a card, gain #b5 #yCod #yGladii. At the end of your turn, lose #b33% of #yCor #yGladii.

VUPShionMod:SapphireRoseNecklace.NAME: Sapphire Rose Necklace
VUPShionMod:SapphireRoseNecklace.FLAVOR: A simply embellished, discreet pendant. Every passing moment of the past in eyes of the sisters has been recorded and engraved in the soul dwelling within.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, gain #b2 Max HP.

VUPShionMod:MartyrVessel.NAME: 苦难黑棺
VUPShionMod:MartyrVessel.FLAVOR: 陪伴少女一生的武器和信标，其中蕴含着常人无法担负的重量。
DESCRIPTIONS: #y祈言姿态 :每回合结束回复 #b2 点生命，获得 #b2 层 #y虚弱 。进入 #y审判姿态 时清空 #y虚弱 。获得 #y自燃 和 #b2 点 #y力量 。

VUPShionMod:HallowedCase.NAME: 沉灵圣棺
VUPShionMod:HallowedCase.FLAVOR: 在更为强大的苦难面前，其散发出真正的光芒。
DESCRIPTIONS: #r替换苦难黑棺。 NL #y祈言姿态 :每回合结束获得 #b2 层 #y再生 和 #y虚弱 。 NL 进入 #y审判姿态 时清空 #y虚弱 ， NL 且之后每回合开始时获得 #b1 层 #y沉灵 。
